CRV-BTC.summary: Curve DAO Token (CRV) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Curve DAO Token has a current supply of 1,514,696,674.6367683 with 352,035,339.2875188 in circulation. The last known price of Curve DAO Token is 2.30785119 USD and is down -7.30 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 134 active market(s) with $318,149,004.23 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://guides.curve.fi/everything-you-need-to-know-about-crv/.
